column1: Are you sure you want to cancel your payment? Click OK to cancel your payment and release the amount on hold. Click Cancel to enter another credit card and continue with your payment.
column2: Wilt u werkelijk u transactie afbreken?

column1: Gateway actions are locked because the gateway cannot complete one or more of the transactions. Please log in to your Authorize.Net account to manually resolve the issue(s).
column2: Gateway actions are locked because the gateway cannot complete one or more of the transactions. Please log in to your Authorize.Net account to manually resolve the issue(s).

column1: If empty, a default value will be used. Custom URL may be provided by CardinalCommerce agreement.
column2: als leeg, wordt het default value gebruikt.
Fout bij het bijwerken van de betaling.

column1: Severe Validation Removes Chargeback Liability on Merchant
column2: Severe Validation Removes Chargeback Liability on Merchant

column1: Shopping cart contents and/or address has been changed.
column2: Shopping cart contents and/or address has been changed.

column1: The amount on your credit card is insufficient to complete your purchase. The available amount has been put on hold. To complete your purchase click OK and specify additional credit card number. To cancel the purchase and release the amount on hold, click Cancel.
column2: The amount on your credit card is insufficient to complete your purchase. The available amount has been put on hold. To complete your purchase click OK and specify additional credit card number. To cancel the purchase and release the amount on hold, click Cancel.

column1: There was an error canceling transactions. Please contact us or try again later.
column2: Er ging iets mis bij het afbreeken van de transactie. Neem contact met ons op of probeer het later nog een keer.

column1: You have reached the maximum number of credit card allowed to be used for the payment.
column2: U heeft het maximum aantal creditcards bereikt

column1: You have reached the maximum number of credit cards that can be used for one payment. The available amounts on all used cards were insufficient to complete payment. The payment has been cancelled and amounts on hold have been released.
column2: You have reached the maximum number of credit cards that can be used for one payment. The available amounts on all used cards were insufficient to complete payment. The payment has been cancelled and amounts on hold have been released.

column1: Your credit card has been declined. Click OK to specify another credit card to complete your purchase. Click Cancel to release the amount on hold and select another payment method.
column2: Your credit card has been declined. Click OK to specify another credit card to complete your purchase. Click Cancel to release the amount on hold and select another payment method.

column1: Your order has not been placed, because contents of the shopping cart and/or address has been changed. Authorized amounts from your previous payment that were left pending are now released. Please go through the checkout process for your recent cart contents.
column2: Your order has not been placed, because contents of the shopping cart and/or address has been changed. Authorized amounts from your previous payment that were left pending are now released. Please go through the checkout process for your recent cart contents.

column1: Your payment has been cancelled. All authorized amounts have been released.
column2: Uw transactie is afgebroken. Uw geld is weer vrijgegeven
